text: Michael Dante (born Ralph Vitti, September 2, 1931) is an American actor. His best known roles were in the television series Desilu Playhouse, along with his roles in the movies Westbound (1959), Seven Thieves (1960) and Winterhawk (1975). Dante was born Ralph Vitti in Stamford, Connecticut on September 2, 1931. Before acting, he played in minor league baseball. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American baseball players Category:Actors from Stamford, Connecticut Category:Sportspeople from Connecticut Category:American radio personalities
title: Michael Dante
